content: I've been trying to find ways to get into character and stay focused during long rehearsals. I auditioned for a local production of A Midsummer Night's Dream and got a call-back for the role of Puck, which I'm really excited about. I've been rehearsing my lines and practicing my physical comedy skills to prepare for the part. Do you have any advice on how to stay organized and manage my time effectively during the rehearsal period?
